output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintTokens function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The transferFrom function allows attackers to steal assets due to incorrect computations involving _amount, aka the 'transferFlaw' issue.
payWinner function exposes the private address of the king, allowing attackers to impersonate the king and steal his funds.
The transfer function does not check the balance of the user, allowing the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
